---
title: "Schools' practices"
author: "Nick Parkinson"
date: "18 July 2024"
format: 
  html:
    css: .formatting/grattan-style.css
    theme: lumen
    highlight: pygments
    toc: true
    toc_depth: 2
    number_sections: yes
    df_print: kable
    fig-height: 5.7
    fig-width: 8.75
    fig-cap-location: top
    fig-dpi: 300
lightbox: auto
execute:
  echo: false
  warning: false
  freeze: auto
editor: visual
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---




## How do schools schedule maths?


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|Approach to scheduling maths                  |     %| 90% CI (lower)| 90% CI (upper)|
|:---------------------------------------------|-----:|--------------:|--------------:|
|Common approach, but no scheduled maths block | 47.2%|          44.4%|          50.0%|
|Scheduled maths block                         | 42.3%|          39.7%|          44.8%|
|Teacher discretion                            |  9.5%|           7.8%|          11.2%|
|Other                                         |  1.1%|           0.5%|           1.6%|


:::
:::

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](school_practices_files/figure-html/hours_of_maths-1.png){width=2625}
:::
:::
